spas
Class LocalSpaceMemory

java.lang.Object
  spas.LocalSpaceMemory

public class LocalSpaceMemory
extends java.lang.Object

The local space structure maintains an awareness of the bundle surrounding Ernest.

Author:
Olivier

addPlace

public IPlace addPlace(IBundle bundle,
                       float distance,
                       float direction)
Add a new place to the local space memory if it does not yet exist. Replace the bundle if it already exists.

Parameters:
bundle - The bundle in this location.
distance - The distance of this place.
direction - The direction of this place.
Returns:
The new or already existing location.

update

                   IStimulation kinematicStimulation)
Update the local space memory according to the enacted interaction.

Parameters:
act - The enacted act.
kinematicStimulation - The kinematic stimulation.

update

public void update(javax.vecmath.Vector3f translation,
                   float rotation)
Update the local space memory according to the agent's moves.

Parameters:
translation - The translation value (provide the opposite value from the agent's movement).
rotation - The rotation value (provide the opposite value from the agent's movement).

Parameters:

Returns:

getValue

public int getValue(javax.vecmath.Vector3f position)
Get the value of the first bundle found in a given position. or STIMULATION_VISUAL_UNSEEN if no bundle found in that position.

Parameters:
position - The position.
Returns:
The value.
